mapper.select: /* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.selectLogin_S01 */ SELECT nw101tl.user_no AS userNo , nw101tl.login_id AS loginId , NVL(nw101tl.pwd_fail_tms,0) AS pwdFailTms , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-90, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') > nw101tl.pwd_chng_dttm THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS pwdChgYn , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') > nw101tl.optr_expy_dttm THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS optrExpireYn , nw101tl.optr_auth_cd AS optrAuthCd , nw100tl.user_nm AS userNm , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AS loginTime FROM NWRK101TL nw101tl , NWRK100TL nw100tl WHERE nw101tl.login_id = #{loginId} AND nw101tl.mbr_dc = 'G' AND nw101tl.optr_auth_cd = '01' AND nw101tl.scde_yn = 'N' AND nw101tl.login_pwd = CRYPTMD5(#{loginPwd}) AND nw101tl.user_no = nw100tl.user_no

/* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.selectLogin_S03 */ SELECT B.OPTR_AUTH_NO AS optrAuthNo , B.OPTR_AUTH_NM AS optrAuthNm , B.USER_AUTH_CD AS userAuthCd FROM NWRK254TL A, NWRK251TL B, NWRK101TL C WHERE A.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND A.OPTR_AUTH_NO = B.OPTR_AUTH_NO AND C.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY 1

/* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.selectLogin_S04 */ SELECT wrk002_one_id , wrk002_kor_nm , wrk002_std_id , (SELECT user_no FROM NWRK101TL nw101 WHERE nw101.login_id = WRK002VW.wrk002_one_id AND nw101.mbr_dc = 'K' AND nw101.SCDE_YN = 'N') AS user_no FROM WRK002VW WHERE wrk002_one_id = #{loginId} AND (wrk002_encode_pw = CRYPTMD5(#{loginPwd}) OR wrk002_encode_pw = CRYPTMD5(#{loginPwd})) AND wrk002_join_dept = 'Y'

/* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.selectLogin_S08 */ SELECT wrk002_one_id , wrk002_kor_nm , wrk002_std_id , (SELECT user_no FROM NWRK101TL nw101 WHERE nw101.login_id = WRK002VW.wrk002_one_id AND nw101.mbr_dc = 'K' AND nw101.SCDE_YN = 'N') AS user_no FROM WRK002VW WHERE wrk002_one_id = #{loginId} AND wrk002_join_dept = 'Y'
mapper.insert: /* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.insertLogin_I03 */ INSERT INTO NWRK101TL ( user_no, login_id , tmp_pwd_yn, mbr_dc , optr_auth_cd, scde_yn , wrt_pn_no, wrt_pn_ip, wrt_dttm , updt_pn_no, updt_pn_ip, updt_dttm ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{loginId} , 'N', 'K' , '99', 'N' , #{userNo}, #{remoteAddr}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') , #{userNo}, #{remoteAddr}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') )
mapper.select: /* homenet.shop.login.service.LoginService.selectLogin_S07 */ SELECT nwrk101.user_no AS userNo , nwrk101.login_id AS loginId , nwrk101.mbr_dc AS mbrDc , nwrk101.tmp_pwd_yn AS tmpPwdYn , CASE WHEN SYSDATE-1 > TO_DATE(nwrk101.tmp_pwd_dttm, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS tmpPwdLimitYn , NVL(nwrk101.pwd_fail_tms, 0) AS pwdFailTms , CASE WHEN SYSDATE-90 > TO_DATE(nwrk101.pwd_chng_dttm, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') OR nwrk101.pwd_chng_dttm IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS pwdChngLimitYn , nwrk100.user_nm AS userNm , nwrk110.etr_nm AS etrNm , nwrk110.etr_no AS etrNo , nwrk110.biz_jang_no AS bizJangNo , nwrk110.del_yn AS nwrk200tlDelYn FROM NWRK101TL nwrk101 INNER JOIN NWRK100TL nwrk100 ON nwrk101.user_no = nwrk100.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN NWRK110TL nwrk110 ON nwrk100.etr_no = nwrk110.etr_no WHERE nwrk101.scde_yn = 'N' AND nwrk101.login_id = #{loginId} AND nwrk101.login_pwd = CRYPTMD5(#{loginPwd}) AND nwrk101.mbr_dc = #{loginDiv}
